attributes.action: Give Roma Gypsy and Irish Travellers children the equal education they deserve !
attributes.additional_details:
The reason we are stating this needs to happen is because the fact that it is proven to be true that children from the Romani Gypsy and Irish Traveller communities are held back from been allowed education and have there school hrs been cut down 

This won’t be the end of this we will keep going till change has happened and the children receive the education and equality they deserve !
attributes.background: Allow Romani Gypsy and Irish Traveller children equal education were there hours will not be cut back and allowed to learn like the settled communities

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
